Horse_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's dangerous to bring a horse into this
area. Much too dangerous to even risk.

If I were you, I'd head north of here to the
<clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff> and leave your horse there.
Horse_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but I can't let any monsters past...<sp:5:1:0>
Why don't you go release it somewhere?
Hopefully somewhere very far away...
Quiz_03_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>OK, question number three is very
important and more difficult than the
last two...
Quiz_03_01:
What cooking ingredient is effective at
fending off high temperatures?
Horse_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There has been some abnormal weather
beyond this point... Blazing heat during
the day, freezing cold at night...
It's dangerous to bring a horse into this
area. Far, far too dangerous to even...<sp:5:1:0>
Wait a second...<sp:5:1:0>
That's not a horse at all, is it? 


Sorry, but I can't let other animals
through, either.

It's simply too dangerous for them beyond
this point.
Horse_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but it's simply too dangerous to
let animals past this point.

Whether it's a horse or some other kind of
animal... I'm not letting any through.
Mistake_04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>This is the last question, you know. I'll
give you another chance, so really think
before you answer.
Quiz_02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>This second question is a bit more
difficult, so pay attention.
Quiz_02_01:
When it is very hot out, where should you
go to cool off?
Mistake_03_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Not a bad choice, but not the correct
one. Think on it a bit more and try again.
Mistake_03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>Did you get distracted while I was talking?<sp:5:0:0>
Your answer would only help you in low
temperatures...
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Very well.


That cautious attitude will serve you
well in Gerudo Canyon. But the lack of
confidence will not.
Come back and speak with me once
you've located your nerve.
Quiz_01_01:
How can you best warm up when
it's cold?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Hmm?<sp:5:1:0> I was going to give you a
splash fruit, but it looks like you're
carrying a lot of things already.
I'm glad to see you well prepared for
whatever lies ahead!

I'm not sure if this is a fitting substitute,
but take it instead.
Answer_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Correct... But the first question is the
easiest one.
Answer_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>That's exactly right. I'm glad that you
appear to have some survival skills...

By the way, dousing yourself in water
would also be a good way to cool off in
the blazing heat. Keep that in mind.
Talk_16:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! You there!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I don't recognize your face.<sp:5:0:0> Come here!
Answer_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Exactly right! I'm impressed—many have
had trouble with that question...
Talk_17:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! You!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


I didn't let you through! Get over here
and answer my questions!<sp:5:0:0>
Answer_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_01>All right! You pass! With so much
knowledge at your disposal, I'm sure
you'll be fine out there.
Oh, and you can take this with you too.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Hmm?<sp:5:1:0> I was going to give you a
spicy pepper, but it looks like you're
carrying a lot of things already.
I'm glad to see you well prepared for
whatever lies ahead!

I'm not sure if this is a fitting substitute,
but take it instead.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you cook using this, you can stay warm
for a while, even at night.

Anyway, you can head on through.<sp:5:0:0>
Take care.
AssassinEquipment_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So...<sp:5:0:0> While I can tell that you are not
actually a member of the Yiga Clan...

<sp:3:0:2:0900>wearing such an outfit in Gerudo Town
will not end well for you. You'll likely be
thrown straight into jail.
As pranks go, this is one you should skip.
Mistake_02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>What was that? There was a...<sp:5:0:0>sound...<sp:5:0:0>and
I didn't catch your answer. <sp:5:1:0>Think hard,
then answer the question again.
Mistake_02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Are you even taking this seriously?<sp:5:1:0>
Try again, and no messing around.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There has been some abnormal weather
beyond this point... Blazing heat during
the day, freezing cold at night...
It's dangerous to be in the area,
though you can take some precautions
to prepare yourself.
To that end, I am going to ask you a
few questions to make sure you can
handle yourself.
If you aren't able to answer my questions,
I will not let you pass.
Quiz_04_01:
Where in Gerudo Canyon could you go to
avoid being affected by the extreme
temperatures, day or night?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can cool yourself down temporarily
if you split one of these with a weapon
and stand in the resulting spray.
You may pass, but be careful out there.
Mistake_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>Maybe you weren't quite listening to
me just then... I'll ask you again—pay
attention this time.
Mistake_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>That is exactly the opposite of what you
should do. Did you answer incorrectly
on purpose?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>You want to give it another shot? I won't
let you through until you get every
question right.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Hey! Hold it!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


You haven't passed my test yet! There's
no way I'm going to let you just walk
on by!
Retire_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>Very well.


Come back and speak with me once
you've learned something of surviving...
and found more confidence.
Horse_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There has been some abnormal weather
beyond this point... Blazing heat during
the day, freezing cold at night...
It's dangerous to bring a horse into this
area. Far, far too dangerous to even try.

If I were you, I'd head north of here to the

That's not a horse at all, is it? It's...some

Well, I can't let any...<sp:5:0:0>monsters...<sp:5:0:0>through,
